title: Google’s AI “GNoME” Discovers 2.2 Million New Crystals Crucial for Modern Technologies
description: Google’s new AI technology tool GNoME, or Graph Networks for Materials Exploration, has achieved a remarkable feat that could potentially fuel future advancements across various technological fields. Recent reports note that researchers used GNoME to identify 2.2 million new crystals, 380,000 of which are deemed most stable. These seemingly simple arrangements of atoms are poised ... Read more
